overview:
Ilya is the co-founder & CTO at GetGoing, Inc

Ilya is an expert in developing and running large-scale highly available web infrastructure including platform, analytics, relevance, personalization, and marketplace design. Immediately prior to founding GetGoingâ„¢ he was Chief Scientist at Ancestry.com, where he was responsible for strategic data solutions and overall data infrastructure for search relevance and ranking, record linkage, personalization, and marketing analytics. Previous positions included Chief Engineer at Digg, CTO of Lifecycle Marketing at Sun Microsystems, Principal Engineer at Yahoo! and a scientist at IBM T. J. Watson Research Center and Sun Microsystems Research Laboratories.

Ilya is passionate about technology, numbers, and web products. He holds a Ph.D. in Statistics from Stanford.
